verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

“\w Command|strong="H6680"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w them|strong="H6680"\w*: \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* enter \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w allotted|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w with|strong="H3478"\w* \w these|strong="H2063"\w* \w boundaries|strong="H1367"\w*:

Your southern border will extend from the Wilderness of Zin along the border of Edom. On the east, your southern border will run from the end of the Salt Sea,\f + \fr 34:3 \ft That is, the Dead Sea; also in verse 12\f*

cross south of the Ascent of Akrabbim,\f + \fr 34:4 \ft Or the Ascent of Scorpions or Scorpion Pass\f* continue to Zin, and go south of Kadesh-barnea. Then it will go on to Hazar-addar and proceed to Azmon,
where it will turn from Azmon, join the Brook of Egypt, and end at the Sea.\f + \fr 34:5 \ft That is, the Mediterranean Sea, also called the Great Sea; also in verses 6 and 7\f*
Your western border will be the coastline of the Great Sea; this will be your boundary on the west.
Your northern border will run from the Great Sea directly to Mount Hor,
and from Mount Hor to Lebo-hamath, then extend to Zedad,
continue to Ziphron, and end at Hazar-enan. This will be your boundary on the north.
And your eastern border will run straight from Hazar-enan to Shepham,
then go down from Shepham to Riblah on the east side of Ain and continue along the slopes east of the Sea of Chinnereth.\f + \fr 34:11 \ft That is, the Sea of Galilee\f*

Then the border will go down along the Jordan and end at the Salt Sea. \w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* \w land|strong="H1366"\w*, defined \w by|strong="H1961"\w* \w its|strong="H5439"\w* \w borders|strong="H1366"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H5439"\w* \w sides|strong="H5439"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, “\w Apportion|strong="H5157"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w land|strong="H1486"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5157"\w*. \w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Reubenites|strong="H7206"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gadites|strong="H1425"\w*, \w along|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w half-tribe|strong="H2677"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, \w have|strong="H1121"\w* already \w received|strong="H3947"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.

\w These|strong="H3947"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w and|strong="H8147"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* \w have|strong="H4294"\w* \w received|strong="H3947"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w across|strong="H5676"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*, \w toward|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w sunrise|strong="H4217"\w*.” Leaders to Divide the Land
\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

“These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3091"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3091"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H3548"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* assign \w the|strong="H3091"\w* land \w as|strong="H1121"\w* \w an|strong="H5157"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5157"\w* \w for|strong="H8034"\w* you: Eleazar \w the|strong="H3091"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w*.
Appoint one \w leader|strong="H5387"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w each|strong="H3947"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w to|strong="H4294"\w* distribute \w the|strong="H3947"\w* land.
These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* their \w names|strong="H8034"\w*: Caleb son of Jephunneh from the tribe of Judah;
Shemuel son of Ammihud from the tribe of Simeon;
Elidad son of Chislon from the tribe of Benjamin;
Bukki son of Jogli, a leader from the tribe of Dan;
Hanniel son of Ephod, a leader from the tribe of Manasseh son of Joseph;
Kemuel son of Shiphtan, a leader from the tribe of Ephraim;
Eli-zaphan son of Parnach, a leader from the tribe of Zebulun;
Paltiel son of Azzan, a leader from the tribe of Issachar;
Ahihud son of Shelomi, a leader from the tribe of Asher;
and Pedahel son of Ammihud, a leader from the tribe of Naphtali.”

These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w ones|strong="H1121"\w* whom \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w apportion|strong="H5157"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5157"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*.
